content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetMetrics path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/dns/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/metrics content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name zoneid
desc an optional zone id to retrieve metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pop
desc an optional stackpath pop code to retrieve metrics from
in query
required false
schema
type str
name startdate
desc a lower bound date to search metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name enddate
desc an upper bound date to search metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name type
in query
required false
schema
type str
default zonequerycount
name granularity
in query
required false
schema
type str
default default
name dimensions
desc the dimensions to aggregate metrics by when empty or unset defaults to all dimensions if nonempty this must always at least include the stack dimension
in query
required false
style form
explode false
schema
type arr
items
type str
sum get metrics
responses
200
prometheusmetrics
type obj
props
prometheusmetricsstatus
type str
default success
desc a metrics querys resulting status
metricsdata
type obj
props
datamatrix
type obj
results
type arr
datamatrixresult
type obj
props
metric
type str
desc the data points labels
values
type arr
datavalue
type obj
props
unixtime
type str
desc the time that a data point was recorded
value
type str
desc a data points value
desc an individual metric data point
desc time series data point values
desc time series containing a range of data points over time for each time series
desc a data points value
desc a set of time series containing a range of data points over time for each time series
datavector
type obj
results
type arr
datavectorresult
type obj
props
metric
type str
desc the data points labels
datavalue
type obj
props
unixtime
type str
desc the time that a data point was recorded
value
type str
desc a data points value
desc an individual metric data point
desc time series containing a single sample for each time series all sharing the same timestamp
desc a data points value
desc a set of time series containing a single sample for each time series all sharing the same timestamp
desc the data points in a metrics collection
errortype
type str
desc the type of error encountered when querying for metrics
error
type str
desc the error encountered when querying for metrics
warnings
type str
desc warnings encountered when querying for metrics
desc a collection of metrics
title: 13_Metrics_GetMetrics_71.json
